RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 7 1/2F Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 29, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 29, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $1 5,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight And Eligibility). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAL'S DREAM forwardly placed outside, continued to stalk in the run up the backstretch, ranged up to challenge three wide with a quarter to run, dueled length off stretch, proved narrowly best in a determined effort. BROKEN PROPOSAL prompted the leader for five furlongs off the inside, challenged between rivals late in the final turn, long, spirited duel to the wire, stubbornly. HONORARY GUEST back off the early pace while four wide through the first turn, continued outside and was four wide again through the second bend, rallied down the stretch to gain the show while closing the gap on the top two late. US SECOND CUTE PIE settled off the pace and the inside, continued evenly in lacking a closing punch. MY LITTLE JEN raced in mid pack while three wide, continued in the three path into the straight, improved a bit late with some moderate interest. MISS JANA broke back and failed to menace. LIMITLESS MAZIE broke on top, showed the way into and through the first turn while a bit keen, held a dwindling advantage far turn, gave way when headed by the top two entering the straight. STRUMMER last to leave, trailed, fell further back stretch, jogged across..

ENTRY.NAME: Strummer
ENTRY.OWNER: Oak Tree Stables LLC (Powell and O'Brien)
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed far back, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Jana
ENTRY.OWNER: Arnaud Thomas L and Cassedy Allen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Us Second Cute Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, went evenly in lacking closing kick

ENTRY.NAME: Broken Proposal
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted leader,bid btwn foes 1/4, long duel, stubborn

ENTRY.NAME: My Little Jen
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and three wide, improved a bit late

ENTRY.NAME: Honorary Guest
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the early pace while 4w 1st turn, 4w again 2nd, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Limitless Mazie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace off rail while bit keen, gave way when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Hal's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed,closer 3w 2nd turn, bid, stretch duel,determined

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SWIFT N TRAFFIC off the lead pack up the backstretch, moved closer in the two path through the turn, shifted out a bit and went after the leader past the furlong marker, wore that foe down under firm handling. KIT KAT KIDD chased the early leader up the backstretch, advanced to duel in the two path through the turn, shook clear when straightened for home, responded when the winner came alongside with just under a furlong remaining, gave ground grudgingly to that one, remained comfortably cler of the rest. PALANTE lacked speed for a half, asked along late in the turn, angled out four wide into the stretch, rallied for the show well out in the strip. MULETRAIN last to leave, void of speed, two path into the lane, picked off a couple tiring rivals while never a serious threat. JACKIE MOON within striking distance early, floated out four wide out of the turn, had little left for the stretch run. PETEY in mid pack outside, 4-5w turn, tired through the stretch. REGINALD AURELIUS clear early from along the inside, dueled the middle part while remaining inside, gave way through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Reginald Aurelius
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear early, dueled middle part rail, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Kit Kat Kidd
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early leader, dueled 2p turn, shook clear, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Palante
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed for half, asked late turn, angled 4w,rallied 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Swift N Traffic
ENTRY.COMMENT: off lead pack backstretch, closer 2p turn, late bid,wore down foe

ENTRY.NAME: Petey
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, tired while five wide into the lane

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, floated 4w into lane, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Muletrain
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, 2p into lane, passed tiring rivals

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7 1/2F Turf CR: 73. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOLLOW THE SAINT in the second flight first turn inside, moved out, continued to follow the two leaders up the backstretch, advanced and challenged three wide into the straight, vied past the furlong marker then drove comfortably clear late. DIXIE FARMER broke in, lacked early foot, continued to lag into the far turn, came four wide and outside the winner exiting the final turn, stalled upper stretch, late push to gain the place, not a threat to the winner. COPPER MOON vied between rivals first turn, dueled in the run up the backstretch and into the far turn, narrowly showed the way into upper stretch, could not match the winner the final sixteenth, caught in the final strides for the place. SUPER ET fell back to trail after the start, continued to lack speed the middle half, came widest for the drive and showed some belated interest down the middle of the course. R T'S GEM forward early inside the two leaders, in the second flight the middle half while continuing to save ground, within striking distance a furlong out, came up empty to the wire. PICKIN ANA GRINNIN pinched back and was forced to check up, moved up quickly to contest the issue by midway on the first turn, dueled the next half mile, faltered from between horses nearing the furlong grounds. ADDI BUG brushed at the start, was finished early.

ENTRY.NAME: R T's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early inside, 2nd flight middle half, empty final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Super Et
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, outside for the drive, late interest widest

ENTRY.NAME: Follow the Saint
ENTRY.OWNER: Thornton Joe and Cascio Andrew J
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 3w bid into lane, bid, drew clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Addi Bug
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed break, finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Pickin Ana Grinnin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched start, moved up to duel, faltered btwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Farmer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, lacked speed, 4w into lane, stalled, late push 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Copper Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Stumpf Donna and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied btwn foes 1st turn, dueled middle half, caught late 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALLY'S MONSOON broke alertly, set a pressured pace up the backstretch and into the turn, shook well clear when straightened for home, enough left to hold that same early pursuer safe late. BAYOU BEAUTY pressed the winner off the inside, fell back off that one in upper stretch, roused and was coming back on that rival late. PORTO DEL ACE void of speed inside, asked along while saving ground midway on the turn, slipped thru along the rail to improve into the lane, closed the gap on the top two a bit late while holding sway for the show. GOLD PLUS forwardly placed in the run up the backstretch, came in the two path for the drive, not enough for the show. NICELY UNIFIED off a step slow, raced back and well out in the strip, four wide exiting the turn, was not dangerous through the stretch. ARTIE'S DEAL off a step slow, devoid of speed in trailing, moved out, five wide into the stretch, not a factor the wire. SANDY AUSTIN in the second group early, began a steady fade before a half, well back at the wire.

ENTRY.NAME: Artie's Deal
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, trailed, 5w into lane, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Porto Del Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, saved ground turn, asked, slipped thru, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Mally's Monsoon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set pressured pace, shook clear, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Sandy Austin
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Nicely Unified
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: off a step slow, 4w into lane, never dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Plus
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, brk in,forwardly placed,2p into lane,not enough for show

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed off the inside, fell back, coming again late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Allowed 3 lbs. Claim ing Price $50,000. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON DAY closest to the early leader, moved closer in the two path before a half while between horses, bid second turn, kicked strongly clear the final furlong under steady handling. BUTLER CABIN shuffled back at the break to be last away, raced back early, advanced two path through the second turn, closest to the winner a furlong out, proved no match for that one while willingly clear for the second spot. MAZING MARK moved well out in the course midway through the first turn, continued wide up the backstretch, made a mild advance four wide through the final turn, up late for the show, no threat to the top two. LITTLE ROCKY broke back, void of speed, two path into the lane, staged a mild rally through some traffic to improve position. GLUCKSTADT forwardly placed off the inside, closer three wide turning for home, remained within striking distance through upper stretch then flattened the final furlong. ITS WILD AGAIN void of speed for six furlongs, roused four wide into the lane, improved position well out in the course with some belated interest. TARAASHOQ fell back to trail after a half, five wide turning for home, picked off a few tiring rivals while never a serious threat. DOUBLE ON THE RED tired from his early efforts after racing with the main body. CAJUN AMI was also finished after five furlongs. F J'S FLACO sprinted clear to set the pace, stopped when headed.

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Day
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, closer btwn before a half, took over, strongly

ENTRY.NAME: Mazing Mark
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved out well wide, 4w 2nd turn, up late 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Double On the Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: tired from his early efforts

ENTRY.NAME: F J's Flaco
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, pace, stopped when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Ami
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished after five furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Its Wild Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w into lane, improved with belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: Gluckstadt
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward, closer 3w turning for home, flattened out final 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Butler Cabin
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back start, back, advanced 2p, willing 2nbd, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Taraashoq
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 5w into lane, passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Little Rocky
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, void of speed, mild rally thru traffic

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SILVER CHALICE away in good order, vied between rivals up the backstretch and through the turn, shook clear when straightened for home, and drew away under steady pressure. CALLEN FEELS GOOD also with the pace from the start, vied three wide and outside the winner, could not match that one in the drive, clearly second best. RAZZ broke well, fell back to mid pack, along for the show late before holding off a rival for that position in the final strides, no match for the top two. CLEVER PRINCE last to leave, lacked speed, came four wide for the drive, found best stride too late well out in the strip while gaining for the show spot late. TRADER PRICE vied up front along the inside for four furlongs, gave way through the stretch. PERFECT STRIKE lacked speed, remained back in failing to rally. MR. BUTCH WOMBLE in the second flight in the early going, began to fade before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed, moved out, 4w into lane, stride late

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Strike
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Butch Womble
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Trader Price
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front inside, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: Razz
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, fell back, along for show, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Chalice
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, vied between foes, shook clear, drew away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Larry Mayo, Mike Mayo & Inside Move Inc.

ENTRY.NAME: Callen Feels Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace three wide, no match, clearly 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERIPHERAL VISION vied early off the inside, fell back off the leader late in the turn, rebid past the furlong marker, wore that rival down under brisk handling. NATURALBORNSENDER moved up to vie soon after the start, garnered a larger lead along the inside late in the turn, responded when challenged in midstretch and gave ground grudgingly while clear for the place. LAKE BALI steadied at the start to be back early, steered out to be five wide into the lane, chased the top two past the furlong marker, made little inroads on that pair late, well clear of the others. SUM CHARM one paced behind the speed, inside turn, traffic late in the bend, continued evenly through the stretch in lacking a closing response. CUPIE CUTIE broke back, continued to lack speed while saving ground, improved position up the inside without posing a serious threat. AMELIES DREAMER vied up front outside the top two, began to retreat late in the turn. SCRAPPY within striking distance for a half four wide, tired through the stretch. A. P. STYLE broke in to bother an inner rival, shuffled back with four furlongs to go along the inside, moved out and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Cupie Cutie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, improved inside

ENTRY.NAME: Lake Bali
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied start, back, steered 5w into lane, clear of rest

ENTRY.NAME: A. P. Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bothered foe, shuffled 1/2, moved out

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, traffic inside turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Naturalbornsender
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to vie, larger lead turn, wore down late

ENTRY.NAME: Peripheral Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, fell back late turn, rebid, wore down foe

ENTRY.NAME: Amelies Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early outside, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Scrappy
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance four wide, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 32000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 29 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Consi dered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BILOXI outrun for a half toward the inside after breaking near the back, swung out to be five wide late in the turn, rallied down the middle of the strip, bid, gained the advantage then dug in late to hold off the runner up while outside that one at the wire. RICKY BOBBY last to leave, also lacked any early speed, three wide and between rivals into the stretch, challenged inside the winner and between horses inside the furlong maker, outkicked to the wire. MOTAWAAFEQ with the early pace, shook clear late in the turn, continued to show the way past the furlong grounds, could not contain the top two the final sixteenth, remained clear of the others. UNION DATA with the pace for four furlongs along the inside, fell back off the leader late in the turn, chased that one through upper stretch and weakened. ASHAAB broke back, lacked speed, improved from between horses in the two path into the lane, flattened out the final furlong to finish up evenly. B W P SPIRIT evenly paced off the inside, raced four wide and between horses into the stretch, lacked a finishing kick. MALIBU S S failed to menace while racing inside. DOUBLE EDGE SWORD within striking distance for a half, had little left for the stretch run. CHARLIE'S CREED contested the early pace while three wide, gave way before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Ashaab
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, lacked speed, improved 2p, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Biloxi
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun for half, swung 5w into lane, bid, took over, dug in late

ENTRY.NAME: Ricky Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,3w and btwn foes into lane,rallied, inside bid,outkickd

ENTRY.NAME: Union Data
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying B Ranch Cattle Company LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front along the inside, chased, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu S S
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace inside

ENTRY.NAME: Double Edge Sword
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, little left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Spirit
ENTRY.OWNER: Norman, Mark and Norman Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly paced, four wide and btwn foes into lane, no kick,

ENTRY.NAME: Motawaafeq
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the early pace, shook clear, no match top 2

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie's Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested early pace 3w, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIL MISS SUNSHINE broke on top, quickly clear, rated in showing the way into the stretch, maintained daylight through the lane while kept to task with a steady right handed crop. TDZ CORRIENDA STAR back off the pace while racing outside, four wide into the lane, rallied to be closest to the winner past the furlong marker, slowly closing the gap on that one while holding sway for the place. FINISHWHATUSTARTED forwardly placed after breaking in good order, in some traffic in the two path late in the turn, improved position to be in time for the show. SECRET MELODY hesitated at the break, void of speed, five wide into the lane, improved mid track. OUR CLOVER GAL in mid pack off the inside, three wide through the lane, went one paced through the stretch. BRIGHTNMORNINGSTAR fell back to trail, five to six wide turning for home, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while never a serious threat. MISSHEARTBREAKER within striking distance off the inside, tired in the drive. DORGENOIS off slow, remained back, was never a threat. APRIORITY GIRL in mid pack for a half, backed up through the stretch. WHO DAT GINGER chased the winner for three furlongs and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Miss Sunshine
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, rated while setting pace, not threatened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Finishwhatustarted
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 2p, traffic late turn, improved when clear

ENTRY.NAME: Dorgenois
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, remained back, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Who Dat Ginger
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased for 3/8, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack for a half,backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Melody
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated break, back, 5w into the lane, improved mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Brightnmorningstar
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, 5-6w turning for home,passed tiring foes

ENTRY.NAME: Missheartbreaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, tired in the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Our Clover Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, 3w into lane, one paced stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Tdz Corrienda Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace outside, four wide into lane, 2nd best
